author: SegmentLinking
body:
This PR adds a dummy implementation of `edm::typeDemangle` so that we don't have to link extra libraries when using the standalone version of LST. This is in response to #49860, where the dependency is introduced through PortableCollections.

c.c. @slava77 @fwyzard
title: Add dummy implementation of edm::typeDemangle for standalone LST
